name: Kitchen Chaos - Code Monkey Course
description:
Controls:
Movement - WASD
Interact - E
Interact Alt - F
Esc - Pause

This is the Code Monkey course:

This course has some awesome stuff like:
 * Rebinding controls on the fly (go to the options menu and check it out)
* All UI elements work regardless of screen size (which I knew this for the Farmageddon game)
* Very clean code to help you understand programming better.
* Controller support with new input system
* Intro to Shader Graph example

Anyway, I had a lot of fun with this course and just wanted to put the end result on there for others to try out before taking the course.
